name: I Am Snowman
description:
Press E to INTERACT with environment.

Press SPACE to GIVE ITEMS and INTERACT.

Move with WASD. Click and drag to rotate camera. Scroll for zoom.

Play in FULL SCREEN because the text system is ... uniquely optimised.  TT__ TT

My first JAM - Had a lot of fun.  Love to Ye Olde Goons for hosting.
